original_title: Der Hammer steht auf der Wies'n da drau√üen
overview: On March 28th 1981, 10.000 people take to the streets. The city of Judenburg demonstrates for the preservation of their steel plant. The demonstration is a start, a late attempt to avert the threat of job loss. The film shows how the international steel crisis affects Austria.
title: The Steel Hammer Out There On the Grass
